title: Sound On: AMLO Snubs Biden, Prime-Time Jan. 6 Hearing
itunes:title: Sound On: AMLO Snubs Biden, Prime-Time Jan. 6 Hearing
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Antonio Garza, former U.S. Ambassador to Mexico and Counsel at White & Case discusses the Summit of the Americas and immigration policy, Bloomberg News Congress reporter Billy House gives us a preview of the prime-time January 6 hearing, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis discussed what to expect at Thursday's prime-time Jan. 6 committee hearing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
